issue.title: [C++] Interface link libraries declared on arrow_shared target that are actually non-interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4577](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4577). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are pulling in `jemalloc_static` as an interface linking dependency in the `arrowTargets.cmake`. But as it is statically linked inside the shared library, consumers don't need to link against it.
